Posts.Content: Stunned_at_33 wrote: Just started chemo (Taxotere, Perjeta, & Herceptin) two weeks ago, at the time I was on my period.  Now nearly two weeks later I am experiencing excessive heavy bleeding.  It was spotty that last few day and then HOLY COW!  Bled through a tampon & pad once last night & twice this morning already.   ONCO doesn't open til 8:30 and I plan to call & talk to the nurse but until than I'm wondering how concerned I should be. Dx 1/28/2014, IDC, Left, 1cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 2/17 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ (FISH) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Excessive mentral bleeding - Taxotere Stunned_at_33
